title: 93/361/EEC: Council Decision of 17 May 1993 on the accession of the Community to the Protocol to the 1979 Geneva Convention on long-range transboundary air pollution concerning the control of emissions of nitrogen oxides or their transboundary fluxes
header:
21.6.1993 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 149/14
COUNCIL DECISION
of 17 May 1993
on the accession of the Community to the Protocol to the 1979 Geneva Convention on long-range transboundary air pollution concerning the control of emissions of nitrogen oxides or their transboundary fluxes
(93/361/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The European Economic Community hereby accedes to the Protocol to the 1979 Convention on long-range transboundary air pollution concerning the control of emissions of nitrogen oxides or their transboundary fluxes.
The text of the said Protocol is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council shall deposit its instrument of accession in accordance with Article 14 of the Protocol.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 May 1993.
For the Council
The President
J. HILDEN
